forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: reset person values

comments.text: could we have an area reset just a single person value, without an interaction? when touched then reset persons.gold, so all players gold reset, but other person values remain
couldn't you just do "when someone new in vicinty" for spawning in, or "when neared"? then set that variable = 0?
@jinx i geuss that'd depend on use-case
the idea is to reset everyone at once, not one at a time. also not repeating, but only when necessary
ah, gotcha. right my idea would only do individuals. unless, try show if far away too + a trigger?

thread.latestCommentText: ah, gotcha. right my idea would only do individuals. unless, try show if far away too + a trigger?
